title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke bare mein kuch baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Ye sab shuru hua bachpan mein, rangon se ek anokha nata tha.
Anushka: Diwali ke diye ho ya Holi ke rang, har cheez mein mujhe canvas dikhta tha.
Anushka: School mein drawing competition... hamesha excited rehti thi. First prize mile ya nahi, dil toh khush ho jaata tha.
Anushka: Phir college aaya, life thodi busy ho gayi, lekin drawing kahin peeche nahi chhuti.
Anushka: Maine socha, kyun na ise seriously liya jaye? Aur phir...digital art mein kadam rakha.
Anushka: Tab se, yeh journey jaari hai. Seekhti hoon, experiment karti hoon, aur har din khud ko improve karne ki koshish karti hoon.
Anushka: Kuch log kehte hain, "art mein kya rakha hai?" Par mere liye toh, yeh zinda rehne ka ek tareeka hai.
Anushka: Aap sabhi ka dhanyavaad jo mujhe sun rahe hain. Hope you liked my short art story!
Anushka: Apni creative journey hamesha chalu rakhiye! Shukriya!
